body: this is too wholesome for my sinned soul
Nice, a tiny bit of extra compassion would have been great, for example a hug after 7th page's end. But i enjoyed it nonetheless

Haha feels like the girl and her dad was fishing for a man. I mean first the guy finds a wounded girl on the road and then I guess she tells him to take her to the inn, then when they arrive and for some reason the owner doesn't tell him it's his daughter and instead tells him their all out of rooms and the only place the two of them can sleep in is a secluded room where they have to stay together. Then she goes on to rape him while he's sleeping, later on apologizes for it and say's he can have sex with her as an apology. While having sex she acts reluctant to him cumming inside cause today is dangerous, even though she made sure he came inside while she raped him over and over. Then he finds out she's the owners daughter + successor most likely after he got her pregnant. So yeah it was a trap all along.
pogs this is soo niceee, im having an heart orgasm
She took him while sleeping she seems to apologize for it later on, but yeah I agree with you.

So was the first page a dream or not!? And they got married but didn't even kiss? I really like this author's artwork but his stories feel a bit rushed. I think they could be fleshed out more but he doesn't even bother trying.
